text: Uye avo vatakapa Bhuku (vakafanana naAbdullah bin Salaam nemamwe maJudha vakagamuchira chitendero cheIslaam) vanofarira izvo zvatakadzikisa kwauri (Qur’aan), asi mune vamwe pakati pemubatanidzwa (wemaJudha nevasingatendi) avo vanoramba chidimbu charo. Iti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Zvirokwazvo, ndakakomekedzwa kunamata Allah chete, kwete kusanganisa zvimwe navo. Kwavari (chete) ndinodana uye kudzokera kwangu kuchange kuri kwavari.”
